This game is pure art, the world design, the voice acting, the captivating intricate plot and the entire idea of a puzzle game that you solve with a portal gun is brilliant and genius. 10/10

I have never played portal 1.. The reason why is beacause i saw a lot of spoilers and ya know... knowing what is gonna happen next is boring.. So i tried many years to get portal 2 and play it actully blind and oh boy isent it good? On portal 2 there are: sarcastic robots, evil robots, Portals, friend cube, co-op, and the number 2! What else do you want? Its amazing!

More and more, I'm playing the community test chambers and I'm loving it!  They make a great mixture of simple and over-the-top(Euclidian, I think is the term?) types of puzzles.  Absolutely a wonderful way of brain work and puzzle solving.
